Action chips

```js
<ChipSet>
  <Chip>
    <ChipText>Text Chip</ChipText>
  </Chip>
  <Chip>
    <ChipLeadingIcon>face</ChipLeadingIcon>
    <ChipText>Icon Chip</ChipText>
  </Chip>
  <Chip tabIndex="0" onClick={() => alert("Click!")}>
    <ChipLeadingIcon>alarm</ChipLeadingIcon>
    <ChipText>Clickable Chip</ChipText>
  </Chip>
</ChipSet>
```

Choice chips

```js
class ChipExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      chips: ["Extra Small", "Small", "Medium", "Large", "Extra Large"],
      selected: -1
    };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <ChipSet choice>
        {this.state.chips.map((text, index) => (
          <Chip
            key={index}
            tabIndex="0"
            selected={this.state.selected === index}
            onClick={() =>
              this.setState(state => ({
                selected: this.state.selected === index ? -1 : index
              }))
            }
          >
            <ChipText>{text}</ChipText>
          </Chip>
        ))}
      </ChipSet>
    );
  }
}

<ChipExample />;
```

Filter chips

```js
class ChipExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      chips: [
        { id: 0, text: "Alice", checked: false },
        { id: 1, text: "Bob", checked: false },
        { id: 2, text: "Charlie", checked: false },
        { id: 3, text: "David", checked: false },
        { id: 4, text: "Ellie", checked: false }
      ]
    };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <ChipSet filter>
        {this.state.chips.map(({ id, checked, text }) => (
          <Chip
            key={id}
            tabIndex="0"
            selected={checked}
            onClick={() =>
              this.setState(state => ({
                chips: state.chips.map(
                  chip =>
                    chip.id === id ? { ...chip, checked: !chip.checked } : chip
                )
              }))
            }
          >
            <ChipCheckmark />
            <ChipText>{text}</ChipText>
          </Chip>
        ))}
      </ChipSet>
    );
  }
}

<ChipExample />;
```

Filter chips with leading icons

```js
class ChipExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      chips: [
        { id: 0, text: "Alice", checked: false },
        { id: 1, text: "Bob", checked: false },
        { id: 2, text: "Charlie", checked: false },
        { id: 3, text: "David", checked: false },
        { id: 4, text: "Ellie", checked: false }
      ]
    };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <ChipSet filter>
        {this.state.chips.map(({ id, checked, text }) => (
          <Chip
            key={id}
            tabIndex="0"
            selected={checked}
            onClick={() =>
              this.setState(state => ({
                chips: state.chips.map(
                  chip =>
                    chip.id === id ? { ...chip, checked: !chip.checked } : chip
                )
              }))
            }
          >
            <ChipLeadingIcon hidden={checked}>face</ChipLeadingIcon>
            <ChipCheckmark />
            <ChipText>{text}</ChipText>
          </Chip>
        ))}
      </ChipSet>
    );
  }
}

<ChipExample />;
```

Input chips

```js
class ChipExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      chips: ["Jane Smith", "John Doe"],
      name: ""
    };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <form
        onSubmit={e => {
          e.preventDefault();
          if (this.state.name) {
            // Add to the array
            this.setState(state => ({
              chips: [...state.chips, state.name],
              name: ""
            }));
          }
        }}
      >
        <TextField
          value={this.state.name}
          onChange={e => this.setState({ name: e.target.value })}
          label="Enter a name"
          box
          fullWidth
        />

        <ChipSet input>
          {this.state.chips.map((name, index) => (
            <Chip key={index}>
              <ChipLeadingIcon>face</ChipLeadingIcon>
              <ChipText>{name}</ChipText>
              <ChipDeleteIcon
                onClick={() => {
                  // Update state
                  this.setState(state => ({
                    chips: state.chips.filter((chip, i) => i !== index)
                  }));
                }}
              />
            </Chip>
          ))}
        </ChipSet>
      </form>
    );
  }
}

<ChipExample />;
```
